# GREAT <img src="man/figures/logo.png" align="right" width="120"/>

<!-- badges: start -->
`r badgecreatr::badge_lifecycle("experimental")`
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of GREAT to estimate the temporal expression pattern of a specific target gene using simple transformations, such as shifts and stretches. 

## Installation

<!--
You can install the released version of GREAT from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("GREAT")
```
-->

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ruthkr/GREAT")
```
